info.title: Condition Contract Type - Read
info.description:
The service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and in other user interfaces.

In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:
 - You can retrieve condition contract types.
 - You can retrieve business volume field combinations based on a contract type.
 - You can retrieve field name assignments to business volume field combination types used in condition contract settlement processes.

x-sap-shortText: Read Condition Contract Type using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Sales Commissions - External Sales Representative(2TT)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2TT " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Set of field combination assignments to a condition contract type.
get.description: Reads field combination assignments for business volume to a condition contract type. It retrieves information such as the set of field combinations, field combination types, minimum entries for field combination and field combination group for business volume selection.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Set of field combination assignments to a condition contract type.
get.description: Reads field combination assignments to a condition contract type. It retrieves information such as the set of field combinations, external field name, field combination types, minimum entries for field combination and field combination group for business volume selection.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_BusVolFldCombnSetTypeAssgmt HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator

Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
